mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.office_name AS "officeName", a.owner_depart AS "ownerDepart", a.add_work_num AS "addWorkNum", a.complete_work_num AS "completeWorkNum", a.pro_work_num AS "proWorkNum", a.work_num_total AS "workNumTotal", a.complete_work_num_total AS "completeWorkNumTotal", a.statis_time AS "statisTime", a.completion_rate AS "completionRate", a.flag AS "flag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO office_owner_statis( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, office_id, office_name, owner_depart, add_work_num, complete_work_num, pro_work_num, work_num_total, complete_work_num_total, statis_time, completion_rate, flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{officeId}, #{officeName}, #{ownerDepart}, #{addWorkNum}, #{completeWorkNum}, #{proWorkNum}, #{workNumTotal}, #{completeWorkNumTotal}, #{statisTime}, #{completionRate}, #{flag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE office_owner_statis SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, office_id = #{officeId}, office_name = #{officeName}, owner_depart = #{ownerDepart}, add_work_num = #{addWorkNum}, complete_work_num = #{completeWorkNum}, pro_work_num = #{proWorkNum}, work_num_total = #{workNumTotal}, complete_work_num_total = #{completeWorkNumTotal}, statis_time = #{statisTime}, completion_rate= #{completionRate}, flag = #{flag} WHERE id = #{id}
